column4: Ok, Q: I just installed Ubuntu 8.04 and updated about 300 packages totaling 270 MB. Do i need to update the distribution to version 8.10 get the latest features of ubuntu or is the magic in the packages that I updated?
you would need to explicitly upgrade to 8.10 to get the latest updates... yes
How do I know what fun I'm missing out on but not upgrading to 8.10 i.e. how do i know what features are package specific and which are distribution specific?
umm... very little is distro specific... if you enable backports, you'll basically get everything but the low level upgrades though
